melodymod:ObsidianStrike.NAME: Obsidian Strike
melodymod:ObsidianStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Gain !M! damage per Rhythm until the end of combat

melodymod:BeatOfLife.NAME: Beat of Life
melodymod:BeatOfLife.DESCRIPTION: When you gain Rhythm, gain !M! time(s) as much block.

melodymod:ChaCha.NAME: Cha Cha
melodymod:ChaCha.DESCRIPTION: Add Triple Step, Side Step and Rock Step to your hand. NL Dance 3. Exhaust
melodymod:ChaCha.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Add upgraded Triple Step, Side Step and Rock Step to your hand. NL Dance 3. Exhaust

melodymod:Choreography.NAME: Choreography
melodymod:Choreography.DESCRIPTION: At the beggining of your turn, dance !M!

melodymod:Clap.NAME: Clap
melodymod:Clap.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Gain 1 Rhythm. NL Draw !M! card

melodymod:FallingLeaves.NAME: Falling Leaves
melodymod:FallingLeaves.DESCRIPTION: Draw 1 card for each step of the current dance. NL Dance 0. Exhaust
melodymod:FallingLeaves.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Draw 1 card for each step of the current dance. NL Dance 0.

melodymod:Hot.NAME: Hot
melodymod:Hot.DESCRIPTION: When you Dance, deal !M! damage times the number of Steps to all enemies
melodymod:Hot.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: When you Dance, deal !M! damage times the number of Steps to all enemies. NL Dance 2

melodymod:Offbeat.NAME: Offbeat
melodymod:Offbeat.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Tempo !melodyMod:T!: hits twice

melodymod:PasDeDeux.NAME: Pas de Deux
melodymod:PasDeDeux.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! block. Give 9 block. Dance 2: deal !D! damage to all enemies

melodymod:PiercingChant.NAME: Piercing Chant
melodymod:PiercingChant.DESCRIPTION: Reduce the strength of all enemies by !M! for this turn. NL Gain 2 Rhythm. NL Exhaust

melodymod:Refrain.NAME: Refrain
melodymod:Refrain.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Rhythm at the start of your turn.
melodymod:Refrain.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Gain !M! Rhythm at the start of your turn.

melodymod:Rest.NAME: Rest
melodymod:Rest.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Tempo !melodyMod:T!: Gain !M! Block next turn

melodymod:RockStep.NAME: Rock Step
melodymod:RockStep.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Gain !M! Rhythm. NL Tempo !melodyMod:T!: Dance 0.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Gain !M! Rhythm. NL Dance 0.

melodymod:Semibreve.NAME: Semibreve
melodymod:Semibreve.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to all enemies. NL Gain !M! Rhythm

melodymod:SideStep.NAME: Side Step
melodymod:SideStep.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Draw !M! card. NL Dance 1

melodymod:Shout.NAME: Shout
melodymod:Shout.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to all enemies. NL Tempo !melodyMod:T!: Apply !M! weak, gain 2 Rhythm and exhaust
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to all enemies. NL Apply !M! weak, gain 2 Rhythm and exhaust

melodymod:Spin.NAME: Spin
melodymod:Spin.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to all enemies. Tempo !melodyMod:T!: add a ghost copy in your hand
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to all enemies. Add a ghost copy in your hand.

melodymod:Stomp.NAME: Stomp
melodymod:Stomp.DESCRIPTION: Dance 2. NL Deal !D! damage. NL End the current Dance.

melodymod:TakeLead.NAME: Take the lead
melodymod:TakeLead.DESCRIPTION: Fetch !M! Dance from your draw pile. NL Dance 3.

melodymod:Whip.NAME: Whip
melodymod:Whip.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Weak. NL Dance 2. NL Tempo !melodyMod:T!: Deal !D! damage.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Weak. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Dance 2.

mysticmodref:ClosingBarrage.NAME: Closing Barrage
mysticmodref:ClosingBarrage.DESCRIPTION: Deals Y damage X times, where Y is equal to your total [#5299DC]Power[] and [#FF5252]Poise[] multiplied by !M!.
mysticmodref:ClosingBarrage.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deals Y damage X+1 times, where Y is equal to your total [#5299DC]Power[] and [#FF5252]Poise[] multiplied by !M!.

mysticmodref:Flourish.NAME: Flourish
mysticmodref:Flourish.DESCRIPTION: Costs [E] less for each stack of [#5299DC]Power[] and [#FF5252]Poise[]. Deal !D! damage twice, then double the [#5299DC]Power[] and [#FF5252]Poise[] amounts.
